deleteAccountText:
. You cannot log in to SAI
 . All data related to your following, likes and comments will be deleted
 . After deletion, the remaining coins and other balance will be erased and cannot be recovered.
 . Upon confirmation of your deletion, our specialist will review your deletion request manually within 30 days. If you wish to cancel your account deletion request, you can re-login to the account again within 30 days.
 . If you do not activate your account within 30 days, the account will be permanently deleted after that.
 . This is an irreversible process as you will not be able to access your account after the permanent deletion.
